tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_samples_metadata (
  sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name STRING,
  researcher_name STRING,
  research_topic STRING,
  sample_description STRING,
  date_collected DATE,
  location_collected STRING
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    sample_type VARCHAR(50),
    collection_date DATE,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    lead_researcher VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_metadata (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR,
    sample_type VARCHAR,
    researcher_id INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    research_project VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE researcher_info (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR,
    researcher_email VARCHAR,
    institution VARCHAR,
    field_of_study VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE research_project (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR,
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE GeneticSampleMetadata (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50),
  sample_type VARCHAR(50),
  collection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
  result_summary TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_samples (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT UNIQUE,
  sample_name VARCHAR(255),
  sample_type VARCHAR(50),
  collection_date DATE,
  researcher_id INT,
  project_id INT);

CREATE TABLE researchers (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  affiliation VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE);

CREATE TABLE projects (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  project_description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE lab_facilities (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lab_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  lab_manager VARCHAR(255),
  contact_info VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE analytical_results (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  analytical_method VARCHAR(255),
  result_value FLOAT,
  result_unit VARCHAR(50),
  result_date DATE);
